abstract: The appearance attributes for Done buttons.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this property to configure the appearance of bar button items that use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum/done] style, when appropriate. If the toolbar doesn’t have a done button, setting the value of this property has no effect.

# doneButtonAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance attributes for Done buttons.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var doneButtonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to configure the appearance of bar button items that use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum/done] style, when appropriate. If the toolbar doesn’t have a done button, setting the value of this property has no effect.
title: doneButtonAppearance
